   125	class HyperbolicCentripetalLoss(torch.nn.Module):
   126	    r"""Hyperbolic loss that regulates the norms of child and parent entities.
   127	
   128	    Essentially, this loss is expected to achieve:
   129	
   130	    $$d(child, origin) > d(parent, origin)$$
   131	
   132	    Inputs are presented in `(rep_anchor, rep_positive, rep_negative)` but only `(rep_anchor, rep_positive)` pairs are involved in this loss.
   133	    """
   134	
   135	    def __init__(self, manifold: PoincareBall, margin: float):
   136	        super().__init__()
   137	        self.manifold = manifold
   138	        self.margin = margin
   139	
   140	    def get_config_dict(self):
   141	        config = {
   142	            "distance_metric": f"PoincareBall(c={self.manifold.c}).dist0",
   143	            "margin": self.margin,
   144	        }
   145	        return config
   146	
   147	    def forward(self, rep_anchor: torch.Tensor, rep_positive: torch.Tensor, rep_negative: torch.Tensor):
   148	        pass
